Component Architecture Comparison

Accordion vs Tooltip Implementation

Aspect Accordion Tooltip Status
Canonical Implementation _Accordion.ts _Tooltip.ts Match
Experimental Interface Accordion.ts Tooltip.ts Match
Styled Components MinimalAccordion MinimalTooltip Match
React Wrapper ReactAccordion ReactTooltip Match
APG Compliance Collapsible Pattern Tooltip Pattern Match
Keyboard Navigation Enter, Space, Arrow Keys Tab, Escape, Focus Match
Third-party Integration None Floating UI Enhanced
Almost Headless CSS Functional only Functional only Match
Playground Integration /accordion /tooltip Match
Ejection Workflow agui eject accordion agui eject tooltip Match
Documentation README, STATUS, spec README, STATUS, spec Match

Accessibility Testing

Keyboard Navigation Test

  • â–¡ Tab to focus buttons - tooltips should appear
  • â–¡ Shift+Tab to navigate backwards
  • â–¡ Press Escape to dismiss tooltips
  • â–¡ Focus moves logically through interface

Screen Reader Testing

  • â–¡ Tooltip content announced when trigger receives focus
  • â–¡ Proper ARIA attributes (role="tooltip", aria-describedby)
  • â–¡ Content not announced when tooltip hidden
  • â–¡ No redundant announcements

Mouse Interaction Testing

  • â–¡ Tooltip appears on mouseenter
  • â–¡ Can move mouse over tooltip content
  • â–¡ Tooltip disappears when mouse leaves trigger+tooltip
  • â–¡ Click triggers work correctly
